Поздрави,

Екипът на ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД

 



 

From: Evžen Vosáhlo <vosahlo@myplast.cz> 
Sent: Tuesday, April 9, 2024 12:50 PM
To: 'Deyan Valkanov' <toplo.valkanov@gmail.com>
Cc: Office <office@tibiel.com>
Subject: Truck No. 3 final invoice

 

Hello Deyan,

 

Attached is final invoice with deduction of advance payment for truck no.3.

 

P.S. how are we standing with nozzles contract?

 

 

Best regards,

 

Evžen Vosáhlo

 

MYPLAST s.r.o.

Skaštice 159

767 01 Kroměříž

 

+420 734 201 585

vosahlo@myplast.cz <mailto:vosahlo@myplast.cz>  

 

 

 

 

From: Evžen Vosáhlo <vosahlo@myplast.cz <mailto:vosahlo@myplast.cz> > 
Sent: Thursday, March 21, 2024 1:08 PM
To: 'Deyan Valkanov' <toplo.valkanov@gmail.com <mailto:toplo.valkanov@gmail.com> >
Cc: 'Ивелин Димитров' <ivelin.dimitrov.tec@gmail.com <mailto:ivelin.dimitrov.tec@gmail.com> >
Subject: Truck No. 2 shipped

 

Hello,

 

Today was shipped second truck with cooling fills, attached are documents including invoice closing advance payment.

 

We plan to ship third truck on next week , can you proceed to payment next advance invoice No. ZF9302240011 (also attached)?

 

Thank you.

 

P.S. Are nozzles O.k.? If yes I can make contract or you can send just purchase order…

 

 

Best regards,

 

Evžen Vosáhlo

 

MYPLAST s.r.o.

Skaštice 159

767 01 Kroměříž

 

+420 734 201 585

vosahlo@myplast.cz <mailto:vosahlo@myplast.cz>
